reviews.text: This very modest Inn is a short walk off the central square of Ste. Mere-Eglise, in a quiet, peaceful corner of a town where most things would be described the same way. The room I stayed in was quite small -- not shocking by European standards -- yet it was also very clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: A pleasure in Ste. Mere Eglise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you find yourself in Ste. Mere, (a good base of operations for a Normandy tour, a bit off the more-traveled tourist path) there are two good reasons to consider the 6 Juin.
reviews.title: Warm welcome

reviews.text: One is the price, which speaks for itself. The other, as previous reviewers have said, is Sebastian, the proprietor. He is exceedingly courteous and helpful -- and multilingual -- and the croissants he came back with each morning were among our trip's memorable pleasantries.
reviews.title: A wonderful place with great host

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night on a Normandy tour. A warm welcome to a clean & cosy room with a very good shower. Nice breakfast and very pleasant host. Idealy situated with car parking on site. Would stay again.
reviews.title: A lifesaver for us

likes.liked: — The kind and generous owner/ staff
